response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item carries a unique value that surpasses $1,500,000 to us, reflecting its exceptional quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We believe it could be an invaluable addition to your collection or serve as a significant asset for your business. Given its unparalleled nature, we are offering this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,800,000. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will have the chance to own a piece of something truly remarkable. If you require more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional product with you.", "product_price": 1800000}
